byline.original: By DAVID M. HALBFINGER and  MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Ending a late flurry of indecision, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey announced on Tuesday that he had decided not to seek the presidency.
snippet: Ending a late flurry of indecision, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey announced on Tuesday that he had decided not to seek the presidency.

headline.main: 'Now Is Not My Time' to Run, Christie Says
